name: 360 Asteroid Shooter (Google Cardboard VR)
description:
Adventure through the galaxy, while dodging and destroying asteroids. Play this new take on the classic arcade game Asteroids for free (and with limited Ad interruptions!)


HIGHLIGHTS:
- Full mini-game and high score system
- Simple controls
- Increasing difficulty over time
- Dark color scheme and environment to minimize eye strain
- Detailed written tutorial with illustrations
- No registration or account needed
- No links to social media
- No push notifications

HOW TO PLAY:
- Avoid moving asteroids for as long as possible by dodging and breaking them up.
- Move continuously through the scene by looking in the direction you would like to be propelled.
- Gain points for each asteroid destroyed.
